archimate:Requirement.name: TM.1.3.12c: c) establishing the scale, impact and severity of actual security incidents so that an appropriate classification can be assigned, which may entail root-cause analysis (sometimes known as 'attribution'), their intent, how the incident happened, where it initiated, what else has been affected, the timeline of the attack and next steps required
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
